data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Mykolayiv, Ukraine.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Mykolayiv, Ukraine

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Mykolayiv to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Mykolayiv, Ukraine to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Mykolayiv.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Mykolayiv.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Mykolayiv to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary:
the state of Mykolayiv, Ukraine has a population of 1,217,100.

We estimate Mykolayiv has 44,109 people who might know Jesus, 841,274 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 331,716 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Mykolayiv, Ukraine that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.
